Team: The Warriors
Team Members: Andrew Chen (ayc23@pitt.edu), Justin Liang (jsl86@pitt.edu), Griffin Holcombe (ghj45@pitt.edu)
Air Quality Data: 
    - The air quality data set was taken from WPRDC and contains hourly data of air quality at different sites 
      https://tools.wprdc.org/downstream/36fb4629-8003-4acc-a1ca-3302778a530d
Police Sector Data:
    - The police sector data set was taken from WPRDC and contains data about how much of a police presence is in each  sector
     - https://data.wprdc.org/dataset/police-sectors/resource/0c94c2fc-487c-491c-97e3-6826e335007a
Fire Incidents:
    - Link to dataset: https://data.wprdc.org/dataset/fire-incidents-in-city-of-pittsburgh
    - Data from WPRDC about fire incidents in different neighborhoods in Pittsburgh
This repository is meant to select the best neighborhood in Pittburgh based on the air quality, based on police activity, and based on fire incidents.
